name: A GUN, A SWORD AND SOME ZOMBIES
name_original: A GUN, A SWORD AND SOME ZOMBIES
description:
NOTE: DO NOT RESIZE YOUR WINDOW, THE GAME CANNOT HANDLE THAT RIGHT NOW!

A short game about killing zombies made for the LOWREZJAM 2021 game jam using HAXE and HEAPS.

Shoot and slash your way through zombies as you try to find the exit. 

Green Boxes = More ammo

Red Boxes = More Health

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Attack: Left Click
  • Reload: R
  • Switch Weapons: SPACE
  • Dodge Roll: LEFT SHIT
  • Change Cursor: , and .
